statements: SELECT product_id, product_name, expiration_date, alert_threshold_days FROM ExpiringProducts;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date, alert_threshold_days, product_id FROM ExpiringProducts;
SELECT * FROM ExpiringProducts WHERE alert_threshold_days > 7;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM ExpiringProducts WHERE expiration_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM ExpiringProducts ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ExpiringProducts WHERE expiration_date > '2022-10-01' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM ExpiringProducts WHERE alert_threshold_days < 10 AND expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(alert_threshold_days) AS avg_threshold FROM ExpiringProducts;
SELECT product_id, product_name, expiration_date FROM ExpiringProducts WHERE alert_threshold_days >= 5 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products, MIN(expiration_date) AS earliest_expiration FROM ExpiringProducts WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ExpiringProducts WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM ExpiringProducts WHERE expiration_date < '2023-12-31';
SELECT product_id, product_name, expiration_date FROM ExpiringProducts ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM ExpiringProducts WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT * FROM ExpiringProducts ep JOIN ExpiryAlerts ea ON ep.product_id = ea.product_id WHERE ea.alert_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ExpiringProducts;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM ExpiringProducts WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM ExpiringProducts WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM ExpiringProducts ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT EP.product_id, EP.product_name, EA.alert_date FROM ExpiringProducts EP JOIN ExpiryAlerts EA ON EP.product_id = EA.product_id;
SELECT * FROM product_records;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product_records WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM product_records ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT p.product_id, e.alert_date, n.notification_status FROM product_records p INNER JOIN expiration_alerts e ON p.product_id = e.product_id INNER JOIN notifications n ON e.alert_id = n.alert_id;

SELECT p.product_id, e.alert_message, n.notification_date FROM product_records p INNER JOIN expiration_alerts e ON p.product_id = e.product_id INNER JOIN notifications n ON e.alert_id = n.alert_id WHERE n.notification_status = true;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM product_records WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM expiration_alerts WHERE alert_date < '2022-12-31';

SELECT product_name, expiration_date, notification_status FROM product_records JOIN expiration_alerts ON product_records.product_id = expiration_alerts.product_id JOIN notifications ON expiration_alerts.alert_id = notifications.alert_id WHERE notification_status = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, alert_date, alert_message FROM product_records JOIN expiration_alerts ON product_records.product_id = expiration_alerts.product_id WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-15';
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE notification_date BETWEEN '2023-02-01' AND '2023-02-28';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM products WHERE name LIKE 'App%';
SELECT id, alert_date FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
SELECT id, alert_id, alert_sent FROM alerts_log WHERE alert_sent = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM products ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT products.name, products.expiration_date, alerts.alert_date FROM products JOIN alerts ON products.id = alerts.product_id;
SELECT users.name, users.email, COUNT(alerts_log.id) AS alert_count FROM users JOIN alerts_log ON users.id = alerts_log.alert_id GROUP BY users.id;

SELECT products.name AS product_name, alerts.alert_date AS alert_date, alerts_log.alert_sent AS alert_sent FROM products JOIN alerts ON products.id = alerts.product_id JOIN alerts_log ON alerts.id = alerts_log.alert_id;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM products WHERE alert_sent = true;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date, alert_sent FROM products WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM products WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date, alert_sent FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT username, email FROM users JOIN user_products ON users.user_id = user_products.user_id WHERE user_products.product_id = 2;
SELECT products.product_name, alerts.alert_date, alert_message FROM products JOIN alerts ON products.product_id = alerts.product_id WHERE alert_message IS NOT NULL ORDER BY alerts.alert_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, log_date, log_message FROM alert_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-10-01' ORDER BY log_date DESC,user_id ASC;
